scripts.report:gen: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item Env:JAVA_HOME -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; npx allure generate reports/allure-results --clean -o reports/allure-report"
scripts.report:open: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item Env:JAVA_HOME -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; npx allure open reports/allure-report"
scripts.report: npm run report:gen && npm run report:open
